mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart(cart_seq, fk_USERNO, fk_class_seq, cart_status) values(seq_tbl_cart.nextval, #{userno}, #{class_seq}, default)
mapper.select: select J.cart_seq, J.fk_class_seq, C.class_photo, C.class_title, C.class_semester, C.class_time, C.class_fee, T.teacher_name, C.class_day ,to_char(C.class_startDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') as class_startDate, to_char(C.class_endDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') as class_endDate, C.class_status, C.class_personnel from tbl_cart J JOIN tbl_class C on J.fk_class_seq = C.class_seq JOIN tbl_teacher T on C.fk_teacher_seq = T.teacher_seq where cart_status = 0 and fk_USERNO = #{userno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart(cart_seq, fk_USERNO, fk_class_seq, cart_status) values(seq_tbl_cart.nextval, #{userno}, #{class_seq}, 1)
mapper.select: select Max(cart_seq) as cart_seq from tbl_cart where fk_USERNO = #{userno} and fk_class_seq = #{class_seq} and cart_status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into awesome_orderlist(no, userno_fk, class_seq_fk, status, price, payday) values (seq_orderlist.nextval, #{userno}, #{class_seq}, default, #{class_fee}, default)
mapper.select: select rownum, C.class_seq, C.class_title, C.class_semester, T.teacher_name , to_char(C.class_startDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') || '~' || to_char(C.class_endDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') as class_term , C.class_day, C.class_time, C.class_fee from tbl_class C JOIN tbl_teacher T ON C.fk_teacher_seq = T.teacher_seq JOIN awesome_orderlist O ON C.class_seq = o.class_seq_fk where o.userno_fk = #{userno} and class_seq = #{class_seq} and rownum = 1 order by o.payday desc
mapper.update: update tbl_class set class_status = 0 where class_seq = #{class_seq} and class_personnel = #{ studentCnt }
mapper.delete: delete from waitinglist where userno_fk = #{userno} and classno_fk = #{class_seq}
